mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.count_id AS "countId", a.count_no AS "countNo", a.status AS "status", a.count_method AS "countMethod", a.count_mode AS "countMode", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.zone_code AS "zoneCode", a.count_op AS "countOp", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.sku_code AS "skuCode", a.lot_num AS "lotNum", a.loc_code AS "locCode", a.trace_id AS "traceId", a.qty AS "qty", a.pack_code AS "packCode", a.uom AS "uom", a.qty_count_uom AS "qtyCountUom", a.qty_count_ea AS "qtyCountEa", a.qty_diff AS "qtyDiff", a.lot_att01 AS "lotAtt01", a.lot_att02 AS "lotAtt02", a.lot_att03 AS "lotAtt03", a.lot_att04 AS "lotAtt04", a.lot_att05 AS "lotAtt05", a.lot_att06 AS "lotAtt06", a.lot_att07 AS "lotAtt07", a.lot_att08 AS "lotAtt08", a.lot_att09 AS "lotAtt09", a.lot_att10 AS "lotAtt10", a.lot_att11 AS "lotAtt11", a.lot_att12 AS "lotAtt12", a.data_source AS "dataSource", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.header_id AS "headerId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wm_task_count( id, count_id, count_no, status, count_method, count_mode, area_code, zone_code, count_op, owner_code, sku_code, lot_num, loc_code, trace_id, qty, pack_code, uom, qty_count_uom, qty_count_ea, qty_diff, lot_att01, lot_att02, lot_att03, lot_att04, lot_att05, lot_att06, lot_att07, lot_att08, lot_att09, lot_att10, lot_att11, lot_att12, data_source, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id, header_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{countId}, #{countNo}, #{status}, #{countMethod}, #{countMode}, #{areaCode}, #{zoneCode}, #{countOp}, #{ownerCode}, #{skuCode}, #{lotNum}, #{locCode}, #{traceId}, #{qty}, #{packCode}, #{uom}, #{qtyCountUom}, #{qtyCountEa}, #{qtyDiff}, #{lotAtt01}, #{lotAtt02}, #{lotAtt03}, #{lotAtt04}, #{lotAtt05}, #{lotAtt06}, #{lotAtt07}, #{lotAtt08}, #{lotAtt09}, #{lotAtt10}, #{lotAtt11}, #{lotAtt12}, #{dataSource}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId}, #{headerId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wm_task_count SET count_id = #{countId}, count_no = #{countNo}, status = #{status}, count_method = #{countMethod}, count_mode = #{countMode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, zone_code = #{zoneCode}, count_op = #{countOp}, owner_code = #{ownerCode}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, lot_num = #{lotNum}, loc_code = #{locCode}, trace_id = #{traceId}, qty = #{qty}, pack_code = #{packCode}, uom = #{uom}, qty_count_uom = #{qtyCountUom}, qty_count_ea = #{qtyCountEa}, qty_diff = #{qtyDiff}, lot_att01 = #{lotAtt01}, lot_att02 = #{lotAtt02}, lot_att03 = #{lotAtt03}, lot_att04 = #{lotAtt04}, lot_att05 = #{lotAtt05}, lot_att06 = #{lotAtt06}, lot_att07 = #{lotAtt07}, lot_att08 = #{lotAtt08}, lot_att09 = #{lotAtt09}, lot_att10 = #{lotAtt10}, lot_att11 = #{lotAtt11}, lot_att12 = #{lotAtt12}, data_source = #{dataSource}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, org_id = #{orgId} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
